comments.body: Yeah, I know...  Since the overflow code is now factored out, including widget-specific info is harder.  I could give the overflow mixin a way to designate the "description" of the widget it's attached to, but that seemed complicated.
The first `Align` widget has to be used here because the TestDataSource function above assumes that the third column is going to be the "generation" column, which is used by other tests.
